comments.body: actually, the correct way to handle this is adding `default: ''` to the `DOCUMENTATION` entry for `become_user`, the same goes for existing `or ''`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +97,101 @@        become_exe = self.get_option('become_exe') or self.name
        flags = self.get_option('become_flags') or ''
        user = self.get_option('become_user') or ''
        if user:
            user = '-u %s' % (user)
